title: Snipe

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the factional kill by plucking and throwing sharp feathers, making it astral.
- Snipeâ€™s ultimate ability, rapid-fire up to 3 feathers at targets of your choice, you may choose the same target up to 3 times, choosing twice will upgrade the attack to powerful, choosing thrice will also make the attack rampage. (1 use, shared by Killing mutants)
- Aim your next attack during the day, this will give you Roleblock, Redirect and Control immunity tonight and make you multitask block (1 use)

desc:
Post 3515
*A lean and agile mutant with brown fur and bright violet plumage, a hybrid of a parrot and a fox.*
